rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with built-in seating area. Includes a foyer area to welcome guests and maintain positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Lively living space incorporating traditional Chettinad design elements like woodwork and stone finishes. Large windows for natural light and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated entertainment area with acoustic treatments to ensure optimum viewing experience. Located at the rear corner of the plot to minimize external noise and disturbances while maintaining energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space designed in a U-shaped layout for ease of movement. Incorporates local culinary design with natural ventilation and lighting considerations.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room and kitchen, facilitating family meals while adhering to Vastu guidelines on dining space orientation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with built-in storage. Placed in a quiet corner for privacy and to enhance positive energy flow.
